bibl.title: Homeric Scholarship and Bible Exegesis in Ancient Alexandria: Evidence from Philo's 'Quarrelsome' Colleagues.
bibl.note: Argues that there were Jewish exegetes who applied text-critical methods from Homeric scholarship to the Hebrew Bible. Aristarchus was their model.
bibl.seg: 241 Alexandrie 341 364 Aristarchus Samothracius Homeri Commentatores Homerus
NIEHOFF Maren R., Homeric Scholarship and Bible Exegesis in Ancient Alexandria: Evidence from Philo's 'Quarrelsome' Colleagues.
Argues that there were Jewish exegetes who applied text-critical methods from Homeric scholarship to the Hebrew Bible. Aristarchus was their model.
